column4: i dont know if im in the right place now, but im desperate after some help with my Dell xps m1330 and Ubuntu 9.04, im really struggeling with the Nvidia GeForce 8400M GS getting overheated, even with the 173 driver
the nvidia drivers are up to v. 185 now ..
i tried to install 185 driver, but then i got some troubles with the X config, and had to reinstall ubuntu
ill have a look at it
